description: This file defines a configuration data class for backend settings, including functions to load configuration from environment variables and a specific file containing MongoDB connection details. It is used for managing and retrieving configuration parameters for a backend service, particularly related to MongoDB connection URI, metrics sampling interval, and retention days.

classes.name: BackendConfig
classes.description: Immutable data class holding backend configuration parameters: mongo URI, metrics sampling interval, and retention days.

methods.name: Optional[str] _read_mongo_uri_from_db_connection_file()
methods.description: Reads and extracts the MongoDB URI from a specific file if present, supporting different formats (starts with 'mongosh ' or contains a URI).

methods.name: BackendConfig load_config()
methods.description: Loads backend configuration by attempting to read from a file first, then from environment variables, returning a BackendConfig object.
